mapper.select: SELECT f.film_status AS film_status, f.film_name AS filmName, f.film_score AS filmScore, f.film_preSaleNum AS preSaleNum, f.film_box_office AS boxOffice, f.film_time AS filmTime, f.img_address AS mainImg, fi.film_length AS filmLength, fi.film_en_name AS filmEnName FROM mooc_film_t f, mooc_film_info_t fi WHERE f.UUID = fi.film_id
